title: Why video game actors are fighting to be seen
description:
How does a video game character get made? And how can the gaming industry improve its standards for the real humans behind its virtual characters?

FEATURING
Jessica Jefferies (@jessicajcasting)
Allegra Frank (@LegsFrank)

LINKS
The hidden world and overlooked problems of acting in video games
Video game voice actors end their yearlong strike

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
Newsletter: Recode Daily 
Twitter: @Recode
